content: possibly repeated, but here is the idea: shouldn't we have a standard way to say "get me this resource (e.g. a careplan) as it was on the date 09-09-2019, at 09:09:09?
sounds like a good idea but we haven't got that

well, you can get all of the versions... and pick the one that was in that date.... If Provenance exists, you could do similar queries into the Provenance to determine which version of the target is in that date range.
all very much reliant on a server supporting version based FHIR Resources
should I add a tracker for that? by "standard" way I mean "hopefully something better than going through all versions"
well, you could socialise it on #implementers to see if there's wider interest, but I think a task would be appropriate
